Source.Name: usysconf
Source.Description:
usysconf is the configuration component of the Solus update architecture. It is responsible for maintaining system consistency and health over time, and can be directly interacted with via the CLI interface.
usysconf is used by the package manager to finish up configuration of all aspects of the system in an incremental fashion.
usysconf is a Solus project.
